title: Hello World HTML
description:
Just a basic skeleton HTML page.

 - Save as `index.html`
 - Open in a web broser

snippet:
<?php

namespace IT;

class Car {
    private $velocityX;
    function __construct(){
        $this->velocityX = 0;
    }
    function increaseSpeed($amount){
        $this->velocityX += $amount;
    }
}
title: Basic PHP Class
description: Basic class structure for a PHP class.

title: Hello World C
description:
Basic C syntax example:

 - Save as `helloworld.c`
 - Compile with `gcc helloworld.c`
 - Run `./a.out`

title: Hello World C++
description:
Basic Hello World C++ application:

 - Save as `HelloWorld.cpp`
 - Compile with `g++ HelloWorld.cpp`
 - Run with `./a.out`

title: Hello World Python
description:
Simple Python Hello World interpreted script:

 - Save as `hello_world.py`
 - Run with `python hello_world.py`

title: Hello World Java
description:
To compile bytecode and run:

 - Save as `HelloWorld.java`
 - Compile with `javac HelloWorld.java`
 - Run with `java HelloWorld`

title: Hello World Haskell
description: I have no idea how this is supposed to work.

title: Download Data to File
description:
Saves some string to a file and downloads to the users download folder.

Must be initiated from a user event.

title: Hello World Javascript
description:
Basic Hello World Javascript file

 - Save as HelloWorld.js
 - Create a `index.html` and load the HelloWorld.js file by typing `<script src="HelloWorld.js"></script>`
